title: EXT_image_webp glTF extension
description: glTF extension for loading WebP images.

uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the image.  Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.  The image format must be webp.

mimeType.description: The image's MIME type. Required if `bufferView` is defined.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the image. Use this instead of the image's uri property.
